messages.subject: YoshiHide
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone have any info about this smith, according to GENDAI TOKO MEIKAN INDEX he is on page 82, but can t find any this other that is real name is Nakamura
messages.messageBody:
Anyone have any info about this smith, according to GENDAI TOKO
MEIKAN INDEX he is on page 82, but can't find any this other that is
real name is Nakamura Saburo, and he started the Taichi movement in
Japan after the war, but no mention on how good a smith he was or
what shrine he was at, if anyone has any info it would be great.

Thanks
Tom
